name: Cooperation
text: §346-249  Cooperation.  Every public official or department shall render all assistance and cooperation within the official's or department's power and that may further the purpose and objectives of this part.  The department and the court may seek the cooperation of organizations whose objectives are to protect or aid vulnerable adults. [L 1989, c 381, pt of §1; am L 1990, c 144, §1 and c 234, §9; am L 2008, c 154, §25]
